emergency_refrigerator_repair.title: Emergency Refrigerator Repair
emergency_refrigerator_repair.description: Customer reports refrigerator failure with food spoilage risk - demonstrates emergency claim processing and rapid technician dispatch
conversation_starters: My refrigerator stopped working overnight and all my food is spoiling!
I need emergency repair for my fridge - it's not cooling at all
Help! My refrigerator broke and I have a lot of expensive food inside

demo_script.setup: Customer Sarah Johnson has a premium policy and her refrigerator failed overnight
follow_up_questions: What's the status of my appointment?
When will the technician arrive?
Is my food spoilage covered?

standard_washing_machine_repair.title: Standard Washing Machine Repair
standard_washing_machine_repair.description: Typical washing machine drain issue - shows standard claim workflow and appointment scheduling
conversation_starters: My washing machine isn't draining water properly
The washer shows error code E03 and clothes are soaking wet
I need help with my washing machine - it's not working right

demo_script.setup: Customer Michael Chen has a standard policy and washing machine drain issues
follow_up_questions: Can I reschedule my appointment?
What parts will be replaced?
How much will this cost me?

safety_microwave_repair.title: Safety Concern - Microwave Sparking
safety_microwave_repair.description: Microwave safety issue with sparking - demonstrates emergency safety protocols and immediate response
conversation_starters: My microwave is sparking inside - is this dangerous?
Help! My microwave started sparking and I unplugged it immediately
I have a safety concern with my microwave - it's making sparks

completed_oven_repair.title: Completed Oven Repair Follow-up
completed_oven_repair.description: Follow-up on successfully completed oven repair - shows post-service communication and customer satisfaction
conversation_starters: I want to check on my recent oven repair
How did my oven repair go? Is everything fixed?
Can you tell me about the work done on my oven?

in_progress_service_tracking.title: Live Service Tracking
in_progress_service_tracking.description: Technician currently on-site for garbage disposal repair - demonstrates real-time tracking and status updates
conversation_starters: What's the status of my garbage disposal repair?
Is the technician still working on my garbage disposal?
Can you give me an update on today's service call?

appointment_rescheduling.title: Appointment Rescheduling
appointment_rescheduling.description: Customer needs to reschedule upcoming air conditioner service - shows flexible scheduling options
conversation_starters: I need to reschedule my air conditioner appointment
Can we change the time for my AC repair?
I have a conflict with my scheduled appointment - can we move it?

new_claim_submission.title: New Claim Submission
new_claim_submission.description: Customer reporting new dryer issue - demonstrates complete claim intake and processing workflow
conversation_starters: My dryer stopped heating - I need to file a claim
I think my dryer heating element is broken
My clothes aren't drying properly - the dryer isn't getting hot

multiple_appliance_customer.title: Customer with Multiple Appliances
multiple_appliance_customer.description: Customer with comprehensive coverage asking about multiple appliances - shows policy benefits and coverage scope
conversation_starters: What appliances are covered under my policy?
I have the premium plan - what does that include?
Can you tell me about my coverage for all my appliances?

demo_script.setup: Customer Lisa Park has premium plus coverage with comprehensive appliance protection
follow_up_questions: How do I file a claim for multiple appliances?
What's my annual coverage limit?
Do I get priority service?

tech_professional_scenario.title: Tech Professional AC Emergency
tech_professional_scenario.description: Tech professional customer with AC failure during heat wave - shows specialized coverage and priority service
conversation_starters: My AC system isn't responding to the thermostat and it's getting really hot
I work from home and need my AC fixed urgently - it's a heat wave
The central air isn't cooling despite being set correctly

demo_script.setup: Thomas Anderson is a tech professional in San Francisco with AC failure during heat wave
follow_up_questions: What makes the tech professional plan different?
How quickly can someone get here?
Is this covered under my plan?

family_multilingual_support.title: Family with Multilingual Support Needs
family_multilingual_support.description: Spanish-speaking family with washing machine issues - demonstrates multilingual support and family-focused service
conversation_starters: Mi lavadora no está funcionando bien, la ropa no se limpia
The washing machine agitator isn't working and clothes aren't getting clean
Necesito ayuda con mi lavadora - no está lavando la ropa correctamente

demo_script.setup: Maria Gonzalez has a large family and needs washing machine repair with Spanish language support
follow_up_questions: ¿El técnico habla español?
Can the technician speak Spanish?
What's covered under our family plan?

medical_professional_priority.title: Medical Professional Equipment Priority
medical_professional_priority.description: Doctor with refrigerator storing medical supplies - shows professional priority and specialized needs
conversation_starters: My refrigerator is making noise and the temperature is fluctuating - I store medical supplies
I'm a doctor and my fridge temperature is unstable, affecting my medical inventory
I need urgent repair - my refrigerator stores temperature-sensitive medical supplies

demo_script.setup: Dr. Elizabeth Harper stores medical supplies and needs refrigerator repair with professional priority
follow_up_questions: How do you handle medical equipment repairs?
Is there coverage for spoiled medical supplies?
Can you provide temperature monitoring during repair?

ultimate_plan_showcase.title: Ultimate Protection Plan Benefits
ultimate_plan_showcase.description: Customer with ultimate plan and dishwasher issue - showcases premium benefits and zero deductible
conversation_starters: My dishwasher isn't dispensing detergent properly
The soap compartment stays closed during wash cycles
I have the ultimate protection plan - can you help with my dishwasher?

demo_script.setup: Robert Kim has ultimate protection with zero deductible and dishwasher detergent dispenser issues
follow_up_questions: What makes the ultimate plan special?
Do I pay anything for this repair?
How quickly can this be fixed?

complete_customer_journey.title: Complete Customer Journey Demo
complete_customer_journey.description: Full demonstration of customer experience from problem report to service completion

emergency_response_demo.title: Emergency Response Capabilities
emergency_response_demo.description: Showcase of emergency handling and rapid response capabilities

service_flexibility_demo.title: Service Flexibility and Customer Control
service_flexibility_demo.description: Demonstration of scheduling flexibility and customer service options
key_talking_points: Flexible scheduling to meet customer needs

premium_services_showcase.title: Premium Services and Specialized Coverage
premium_services_showcase.description: Highlight premium plan benefits and specialized professional coverage

multicultural_accessibility.title: Multicultural and Accessibility Features
multicultural_accessibility.description: Demonstrate inclusive service approach and accessibility features

setup_recommendations: Start with customer lookup using email or policy number
Have multiple browser tabs ready for different scenarios
Prepare realistic customer personas and backstories
Prepare backup scenarios in case of technical issues
Have customer data sheets ready for reference
conversation_techniques: Demonstrate both simple and complex requests
Show error handling and edge cases
Highlight AI understanding and context awareness
Include follow-up questions to show context retention

questions_to_expect: How does the MCP integration work?
What happens if a server goes down?

business_audience.demo_depth: Focus on business value and outcomes
questions_to_expect: What's the ROI on this system?
How does this improve customer satisfaction?
What are the operational cost savings?

sales_audience.demo_depth: Emphasize customer benefits and plan tiers
questions_to_expect: How do we position premium plans?
What are the key selling points?
How does this compare to competitors?

common_issues.solution: Check MCP server connections and restart if needed
Verify customer ID and reload mock data

preparation_checklist: Test all demo scenarios 30 minutes before presentation
Verify mock data is current and realistic
Check MCP server status and connectivity
Have backup scenarios ready for each demo type
Test conversation flows with various input styles
